entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Database First: Keeping EF Core Models In Sync #26519
  • Defect: Select after projection behaves unexpectedly in Azure Cosmos DB provider #26517
  • Convert more unit tests to use DI #26510
  • Review use of EF internal code in relational, providers and extensions #26508
    MQ
  • Sqlite Spatial: dotnet 5.0.11 crashes when loading Spatial Extension #26507
  • Delay entity state changed event until all property changes have been detected #26506
    Backlog
  • Owned type w/ uni-directional HasMany #26505

Closed

  • [Minor/Convenience] Creating classes from model snapshot. #26492
  • Be consistent about not using the Exception parameter of ILogger #19045
  • Proposal: prevent generating a default DbContext constructor when using dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold --no-onconfiguring #23515
    7.0.0
  • Insert record sequentially in DB without identity on PK #26480
  • Visual Studio assumes return value from FirstOrDefaultAsync() cannot be null #26485
  • When removing the relation of a parent/child entities with Foreign key as string, the child is deleted without notification. #26473
  • when i use EF.CompileAsyncQuery((DbContext db, Func<TEntity, bool> filter) => db.Set<TEntity>().Where(filter)),there has been an error #26402
  • TagWith/TagWithCallSite with lazy loading tags only first query #26474
  • Bug occurs when one-to-one with optional navigation property #26489

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26518
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26516
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26515
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Set default capacity of prepared Statements #26514
  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore.InMemory #26509

Merged

  • Update branding for 3.1.22 #26512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #26513
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #26511
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Do not scaffold a default constructor when OnConfiguring is suppressed #26470
    community-contribution
  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore.Design #26481

Updated

  • Add Migration name check #26396
  • [6.0.1] Allow non-nullable value comparer to be applied on nullable properties #26430
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Query: Copy client projections when updating SelectExpression #26431
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.21.0 to 3.22.1 #26503
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
